sentence: There is also one night club one social lounge 4 pools with swim up bars and an abundance of palapas and cabanas for the intimate beach experience
My cousin and I just came back from a 5 night 6 day stay at the Paradisus Cancun and we could not be more pleased with the hotel the staff the food and the overall experience
Was again the best experience of my life

See the attached picture of all of us following dinner our last wondrous eveningWhile the boys swam in the pools and frolicked in the waters of the Sea of Cortez with Jerry and An my mother and I leisurely either lounged in the shade of the cushy cabana or basked in the vibrant omnipresent sunlight reading a copious number of books as devoid of electronic devices as possible
I spend 5 days at this hotel and it ranks as the most luxurious experience of my life so far
All of the servers including Hector Abraham Santiago Diego DD made our dining experiences great
Great experience best hospitality ever experienced
Of course we have fond memories of Cancun in general and our time at Paradisus specifically but Asunción was the person who most directly contributed to our positive experience
Best experience every year
My husband and I just got home from a 5 day stay with Royal Service at this beautiful resort and it was an epic experience and we will for sure only stay here when we come
The booking experience was a nightmare between the resort and Hotels they kept making promises and denying them
So if you would try to forget about bad food or poor experience it was impossible because drinks were mixed poorly and beer was just bad
I get that these are small things but they should be thought about from a guest convenience aspect
Each year we notice incremental improvements in various areas which indicates Club Meliá and Paradisus are always trying to improve the guest ’s experience
I thought the website would be overseling the experience
I have never in my life experienced such a poorly run property
Sadly the resort seems to be suffering financially and started cutting corners making the experience less impressive
Never experienced this before having stayed in Cancun resorts previously

At the reception we came across a very angry girl and a displeased girl but we tried not to pay attention From the beginning When the doors to the hotel open you are immediately overcome by a pleasant trail of aroma oils fresh flowers and lots of vibrant blooming greenery are around
In general the hotel is really chic but it would be nice to make more interesting rooms and corridors
